The R package stelfi Charlotte M. Jones-Todd & Alec van Helsdingen Installation The development version of stelfi package can be installed from GitHub: devtools::install_github("cmjt/stelfi") The stelfi package requires installation of the non-CRAN package INLA. To install INLA use install.packages("INLA",repos=c(getOption("repos"),INLA="https://inla.r-inla-download.org/R/stable"), dep=TRUE) If you have any issues please follow these instructions.
